title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: On 19 May 2023, Sven Mislintat took over as Ajax's sports director. He succeeded Marc Overmars, who left in early 2022. Mislintat appointed Maurice Steijn as head coach. Mislintat spent approximately 111 million euros on transfers. Ajax had its worst start to the season in fifty-nine years.

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant and is signing a contract of the same duration. Date: 31.05.2025 · Photographer: AFC Ajax ·

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: Farioli signed a three-year contract, starting June 11, 2024 and running until June 30, 2027. Date: 23.05.2024 · Photographer: AFC Ajax · #Farioli · Farioli (Barga, Italy, April 10, 1989) will become the head coach of Ajax's first team.

title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 May 2024, Farioli was appointed head coach of Dutch club Ajax, signing a three-year contract and becoming the club's first Italian manager.
